name: Pac-Man: Tree Top Token Game
description:
All Pac-Man wants to do is dance! Hop across a row of platforms to collect Pac-Dots and avoid ghosts! Score 200 points to earn the token Pac-Man needs to play the jukebox!

PC CONTROLS: Left and right arrows to move, Up arrow to jump, Enter to Pause

This game is a fan-made remake of an old browser minigame from the now-defunct website for Pac-Man World 2, a video game released in 2002 for the Nintendo Gamecube, Playstation 2, Xbox, and PC. This version not only has subtle gameplay improvements and can be played offline, but it is also built for play on Android devices.
